EmailTemplate.name: ES-2019-05-09 Maui Jim e Blast #1.MauiJim_Event_Email1
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Your Maui Jim Custom-Fitted Sunglasses
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/hybrid-cloud-it-transformation-custom-sunglass-event-tickets-59789512040]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Custom Sunglass Fitting & IT Transformation Event Are you tasked with transforming your data center for a Hybrid Cloud initiative? Are you looking to accelerate your company's IT transformation process? If so, then you know this is a very complex and challenging project.
Join us for an exclusive event to get fitted for a pair of custom Maui Jim sunglasses on Thursday, May 9th, at 6355 East Paris Ave in Caledonia, MI. You will get a chance to network and dialog with IT leaders, such as yourself, who are in the midst of similar IT projects and looking to learn about the industry's best hybrid cloud deployment practices.
As space is limited, please RSVP TODAY <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/hybrid-cloud-it-transformation-custom-sunglass-event-tickets-59789512040]]> to reserve your seat! Custom Sunglass Fitting & IT Transformation Event Presidio Office
Thursday, May 9th, 9:00 AM EDT | Caledonia, MI RSVP Here <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/hybrid-cloud-it-transformation-custom-sunglass-event-tickets-59789512040]]>
Sincerely, The Turbonomic Team
